gate.creole.boilerpipe

Class PositionedTextBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.l3s.boilerpipe.document.TextBlock
      • gate.creole.boilerpipe.PositionedTextBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class PositionedTextBlock
extends de.l3s.boilerpipe.document.TextBlock
implements Cloneable
    An instance of TextBlock that stores positional information allowing GATE annotations to be created to cover the same text spans.
    Author:
    Mark A. Greenwood
